atk-s0402a33:2_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame yathābhataṁ nikkhittoti yathā ānetvā ṭhapito.
atk-s0402a33:4_1: Dasame sunakkhattantiādīsu yasmiṁ divase tayo sucaritadhammā pūritā honti,
atk-s0402a33:4_3: tenassa sadā sunakkhattaṁ nāma hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a33:4_10: Ettha ca dasaccharapamāṇo kālo khaṇo nāma,
atk-s0402a33:4_11: tena khaṇena dasakkhaṇo kālo layo nāma,
atk-s0402a33:4_12: tena layena ca dasalayo kālo khaṇalayo nāma,
atk-s0402a33:4_14: tena dasaguṇo khaṇamuhutto nāmāti ayaṁ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a33:4_15: Suyiṭṭhaṁ brahmacārisūti yasmiṁ divase tīṇi sucaritāni pūritāni,
atk-s0402a33:4_16: tadāssa seṭṭhacārīsu dinnadānaṁ suyiṭṭhaṁ nāma hoti .
atk-s0402a33:4_17: Padakkhiṇaṁ kāyakammanti taṁ divasaṁ tena kataṁ kāyakammaṁ vaḍḍhikāyakammaṁ nāma hoti.
